name: Kimulator 2: Brother Of Time
description:
Kimulator 2 is an interactive movie comedy created by Bmc Studio.

In this game, you will play the role of Vincent, the french canadian, on his quest to kill Adolf Hitler. Of course, he will need the help of jesus christ, his trustworthy friend (Played by TofuTehSurvivor), and a stange man. Are you ready to follow the new story of your favorite french canadian? Or are you too much of a scrub to try?

Prepare yourself for one of the best meme fmv choose your own adventure games you will ever see in your life!

Features:

Beautiful artwork and animation made by Shadok123

More choices than our previous games!

Use state of the art voice controls to guide the french canadian and his friend!*

Noscope Adolf Hitler!

Batteries included!*

Your choices will actually affect gameplay!

Historically accurate!*

Cameo by level94836 and TofuTehSurvivor!

Can support up to 10000000 players online!*


*Not actually a feature, why would you think the game would actually come with all this stuff?



Music used in the trailer is call Something Wicked by Ross Bugden - Music
